jcolibri.cbrcore
Class CBRCore

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.cbrcore.CBRCore
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CBRCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class will manage the framework. A new instance of this class must be created for any CBR application that wants to be run.

See Also:
